indonesia.description: Gather all the necessary documents required for a Indonesia tourist visa including passport and other supporting documents required by the Indonesia authorities. If your documents are in a language different from English, they need to be translated.

Check Indian passport is valid with at least 6 months of validity beyond their intended stay in Indonesia. If not apply for a new Indian passport. The passport must also have at least one blank page for visa stamps.

Created your account online, select the type of visa you are applying for and follow the prompts to complete the online visa application form. This form requires personal information, passport details, and intended travel plans to Indonesia. Make sure to fill out the form accurately and completely.

Complete the visa application form. The form will ask you personal information, passport details, and intended travel plans to Indonesia. Be sure to answer all questions accurately and truthfully. Incorrect information or misleading statements can result in a delay or rejection of your visa application.
If your application is approved, you will receive your Indonesia visa via email. Once your receive your the visa, download and print the e-visa and carry it with you when traveling to Indonesia.
Upon arrival in Indonesia, go to the immigration counter to begin the immigration clearance process. Make sure you have all the required documents are ready.
Submit your passport to officer at immigration counter. You may be required to provide proof of return or onward travel and financial means to support their stay in Indonesia.

The processing time for the process is typically few hours based on the queue. During this time, your passport and any other documents will be reviewed by immigration officer. If approved, the applicant will receive stamp on passport.

Fill the application form for Eritrea.
Schedule an appointment with the Eritrea embassy or consulate where you will submit your application. You can do this online or by contacting the embassy or consulate.
After filling, providing the required documents with your passport and make the payment and submit visa application at the embassy of Eritrea

After submission your Eritrea visa application, passport and any other documents will be reviewed by immigration officer. The visa application will either be approved or denied based on the information provided in the application and the supporting documents.
If application is approved, the applicant will receive Eritrea in their passport and can collect passport from the  Eritrea embassy or consulate.
